pages.text: $(o)Long ago in the depths of the Nether, many $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/blaze)Blazes$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/outvoted/wildfire)Wildfires$(/l) fought in the $(l:patchouli:structures/burning_arena)Burning Arena$(/l) to try to obtain the immortality.$(br2)$(o)A champion is still waiting latently for a formidable warrior to appear and face them in a last fated duel.$(br2)First you need to obtain the $(l:patchouli:creatures/outvoted/wildfire)Burning Ashes$(/l) dropped by $(l:patchouli:creatures/cataclysm/ignited_revenant)Ignited Revenant$(/l) on death.

$(o)Then you have to go to the top of the arena.$(br2)Finally, to summon this powerful warrior you have to place the burning ashes obtained on the $(l)Burning Altar$().$(br2)Be prepared, a real challenge awaits you...
